Series II. Commercially Distributed Audiovisual Materials [RESTRICTED]
Time Inc. The March of Time Audiovisual Collection
Time Inc. The March of Time Audiovisual Collection
The March of Time: The Great Depression: Special Collector's Edition Box Set
The March of Time: The Great Depression: Special Collector's Edition Box Set
One box set with six videocassettes. Included in the set:
1 videocassette (VHS) (88 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents The Great Depression Time Marches in 1935 Part 1"
1 videocassette (VHS) (88 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents The Great Depression Economy Blues 1935-1936 Part 2"
1 videocassette (VHS) (82 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents The Great Depression Trouble Beyon Our Shores 1935-1936 Part 3"
1 videocassette (VHS) (111 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents The Great Depression War and Labor Woes 1936 Part 4"
1 videocassette (VHS) (106 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents The Great Depression Prosperity Ahead 1936 Part 5"
1 videocassette (VHS) (97 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents The Great Depression Reality and America's Dreams 1937 Part 6"
